ygData.subject: Re: The Old Maximal Base/Unicron's come back
ygData.msgSnippet: Tucson turns to Depthcharge and gives his all casual smile.  He was always happy to have a comrade along. Of course you can Depthcharge, I never know when

Tucson turns to Depthcharge and gives his all casual smile.  He was always =
happy to have a comrade along.

"Of course you can Depthcharge, I never kno=
w when backup will be needed.  No matter how strong one thinks he is, it's =
always good to be ready for the unexpected."

Even though he was now a Prim=
e, and possibly had the power to overcome the most difficult of situations,=
 Tucson knew that it was also good to be conservative with what powers you =
are given.  He then looks back to Talon with that curious smile, and then l=
ooks back to Depthcharge.  

"I - have to admit, talking to Nighstrike wasn=
't the only thing on my mind. I may be good at quite a few things, but, the=
re is something I'm not too good at.  Or at least I haven't tried to do yet=
...  Talon is beautiful, and I really would like to get to know her, but ho=
w to approach her without offending her..  I'm sure there's bots out there =
that wouldn't hesitate to make a pass at her, but I don't believe in that k=
ind of behavior.."

After assuring that the way was clear outside, Rat Trap=
 catches up to Tucson, and the others, as Quickstride remains outside happi=
lly munching on plants out on the field. 

" Not too much action out there,=
 thought I'd come in 'n see what was gon' on in here.  Wheels, you're kinda=
 turn'n a little red around the faceplate..  You okay?"

Tucson gives his l=
ittle friend a sheepish grin.

"Oh, I'm fine, nothing to worry about Rat Tr=
ap..."

Rat Trap looks at how Talon smiles at Tucson.  He wasn't stupid, he=
 knew.

"Oh, I get it.  Ya know, you're a really nice guy, and I bet she'll=
 really appreciate that.  You should just go'n talk ta her, be yourself."

=
Tucson hiccups for a moment.  Then he realizes Rat Trap had a valid point.
=

"You're right.  Wish me luck guys."

While heading to talk to Nightstrike,=
 Tucson hangs back and stands beside Talon.  Rat Trap stays with Depthcharg=
e and the others.  He keeps his tiny fingers crossed, hoping that another r=
elationship evolves.

" I think this was meant ta be guys.. I sure hope it =
is, he's a really nice bot, not too many of 'em around anymore, except for =
you guys.."

Tucson looks to Talon and gathers all his courage at this poin=
t to finally speak up and start the conversation.

" When I couldn't see an=
ything, you a great help in that first battle we fought together..  I - don=
't think anyone else would have risked their life like you had, for me.  A =
piece of " Old Junk" as Nightstrike put it..  After that, you stuck by me w=
hen you didn't have to.  That meant quite a bit to me Talon.  It still does=
.  And now, in more ways than one..  I - meant what I said, you're more bea=
utiful than I ever imagined before I could see what you looked like.  And n=
ot only are you beautiful on the outside, you're also beautiful on the insi=
de."

He gently takes her hand.

" I'm sure you've heard this from a lot of=
 other bots but I mean every word honestly.  And I'd be honored if you coul=
d continue to be beside me not only in battle, but companionship." 

He rem=
embered an artifact, a tiny artifact that he had found on Atlantis.  A comp=
ass, which he was able to restore simply by feel alone.  The compass also h=
eld a tiny pearl inside, as part of its decoration.  He takes it out of his=
 subspaced gauntlet, and presents it to Talon.

" Now I know why I held ont=
o this for so long.  Before I left Atlantis, I was working on restoring thi=
s artifact.  It's nothing large, but, I know it's valuable.  I'd like you t=
o have this."

The pearl sparkles as lights touch it.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoog=
roups.com, Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:
>
> "That will be fine.  We've be=
en so busy here thay I haven't had a chance to
> do much of anything," said=
 Perseus, returning the salute.
> 
> Just then Depthcharge came out of the =
command center door, followed by
> Kenzo.
> 
> "Ah, so you were the maximal=
 in the CR chamber.  I am Perseus, the leader of
> the Pasificus Maximals."=

> 
> "Depthcharge, Maximal Security," he replied with a formal tone.  "If =
you
> need to interrogate someone, I have some experience with that and may=
 be
> able to help."  He turned to Tuscon, "May I accompany you?"
> 
> On M=
ar 30, 2010 10:20 AM, "Sandy" <magicquartz@...> wrote:
> 
> Tucson had gott=
en Lord Elder's message.  He wasn't quite sure who
> Nightstrike worked for=
, and was happy for the word up.
> 
> "Thank you Lord Elder, I should have =
asked that before I left, my bad.
> Tucson Prime out.  Sorry Lord Perseus, =
it was Lord Elder. I'm glad he
> contacted me because I didn't know that Ni=
ghtstrike wasn't one of Hydras'
> men.  But, I still need to question him o=
f course.  It's great to actually
> see you this time, sir."
> 
> He salute=
s Lord Perseus, and then looks over to Talon who smiles back to
> him.  He =
had not forgotten her.  He had strong feelings for her and was
> happy to s=
ee her for the first time.
> 
> " You're even more beautiful than I imagine=
d before I could see you.  When
> I'm finished, I'd really like to - well..=
 You know um, get to know you a
> little better..  Er... I'm not good at th=
is..  Anyway, I have to go."
> 
> He visibly turns a slight shade of red ar=
ound his optics.  He then gathers
> himself to prepare to question Nightstr=
ike as to Unicron's intentions.  He
> knew he had several things happening =
at once, and to be a Prime to him,
> meant he had to be well rounded.  He a=
lso felt that Unicron's objectives had
> something to do with the opression=
 that was hovering over the planet.  As
> always, he was curious as to why =
things were happening.
> 
> " If it's all right with both of you, I'd like =
to ask Nightstrike some
> questions.  When in doubt, seek the answers from =
unlikely resources...
>  Something I kind of learned on my own."
> 
>
